segments.text: I'm the coolest high-tech stud around ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? Do you have a robot girlfriend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet ... I got an MP3 player and a set of stereo headphones .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you can download MP3 music from the Net and record it onto the MP3 chip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep ! And take it with me anywhere ! And the music is free !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see it ! It's so small !
segments.speaker: S2
